subject: Negotiation
title: Competitive vs. Collaborative
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Competitive vs. Collaborative.

hook.text: Hard bargainers win more per deal but close fewer deals overall.

buildup.text: Competitive negotiators grab the biggest slice. Collaborators try to bake a bigger pie.

discovery.text: Research shows pure competitors earn less over time than those who mix both styles.

twist.text: The best negotiators shift styles depending on the situation â€” no single mode works always.

climax.text: Against a shark, you need teeth. Against a partner, you need open hands.

punchline.text: Style should fit the situation, not your ego.

quiz.question: Which approach produces the best long-term results?
options: Mixing styles based on the situation
